discovery.title: Setup mode
discovery.info: Discover or connect to Philips Hue hub
discovery.description: Leave blank to use auto-discovery and click _Next_. The device must be on the same network as the remote.

discovery_failed.title: No new Philips Hue hubs found
discovery_failed.header:
Please make sure that your Philips Hue hub is powered on and accessible from the same network as the remote. Already configured devices are excluded from the discovery.
Click Next to try again, or close this dialog to abort.

confirmation.title: Philips Hue setup
confirmation.footer: Please press the button on the Philips Hue Bridge and click _Next_.
